review_text: It’s a good budget gaming laptop. Enough RAM and a good GPU and Intel CPU. Ran benchmarks on it and they ran well although rating was lower than I would have expected the FPS were high
name: Zamela Rush

review_text: Good pc runs everything in high and ultra at 120fps or more, only thing is that the listing said has a 3200mhz ram memory but comes with 2966mhz
name: Tom Cruse

review_text: I bought this laptop for both school and to play some games during my free time.  It works very well, I currently play Skyrim with about 79 mods and I have a stray 55 FPS at ultra settings.  Battery while playing games is abysmal (only 1 1/2 hrs) but when I’m just browsing and streaming it lasts about 5-7 hours.  I like it as my first gaming laptop.
name: Mark Timoty

review_text: I love this laptop. As someone who has never owned a pc or gaming laptop I am very delighted by this laptop. I bought it for my 16th birthday predominately for VR usage with my quest 2, and it more than delivers. It runs pretty much any game smoothly with great graphics. I do recommend  getting a cooling pad and keeping it plugged in but those are my only two suggestions
name: Serena Rushi

review_text: Great computer. I got it for 800 on a weekend deal. At that price point it far outpaces anything else that I could find.  Battery life is about 2 hours though so that is the big downside. The smaller ram stick is also not ideal, but I haven't actually noticed any lag in performance because of it
name: Alia Candy

review_text: This laptop has some serious power.  It can handle almost anything I throw at it while staying cool and silent.  The build quality is also great!
name: Jim Bargline
